search.query: | rest /services/data/transforms/lookups splunk_server=local | search filename!="*demo*" filename IN ("*asset*" "*identity*") disabled=0 | stats count

| rest /services/data/transforms/lookups splunk_server=local | search filename IN ("*asset*" "*identity*") disabled=0 | table eai:acl.app title filename updated | sort eai:acl.app | rename eai:acl.app as App, filename as "Lookup File", title as Title, updated AS "Last Updated"

panel.title: Asset & Identity lookup size (in bytes) - past 30 days

search.query: index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.lookup_usage" "data.transform" IN ("*asset*" "*identity*") | timechart span=1d useother=f values(data.size) by data.transform
| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search disabled=0 action.correlationsearch.enabled=1 | stats count

| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search disabled=0 NOT eai:acl.app IN ("*test*" "search" "splunk_rapid_diag" "splunk_app_*" "splunk_archiver" "splunk_instrumentation" "splunk_monitoring_console") | stats count by eai:acl.app | rename eai:acl.app as App, count as Count

index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access | rex "\\/data\\/ui\\/views\\/(?<dashboard>[^\?]+)" | search dashboard=ess_security_posture | stats count | eval "Count Type"="Security Posture" | append [ search index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access | rex "\\/data\\/ui\\/views\\/(?<dashboard>[^\?]+)" | search dashboard=ess_soc_operations | stats count | eval "Count Type"="SOC Operations"] | append [ search index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access | rex "\\/data\\/ui\\/views\\/(?<dashboard>[^\?]+)" | search dashboard=ess_executive_summary | stats count | eval "Count Type"="Executive Summary"] | table "Count Type", count | rename "Count Type" as Dashboard, count as Count

panel.title: Avg duration (in seconds) on dashboard pages - past 30 days

search.query: index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.feature_usage" data.view IN ("ess_executive_summary" "ess_soc_operations" "ess_security_posture") | stats avg("data.avg_spent") by data.view | rename avg(data.avg_spent) as "Avg time spent in seconds", data.view as Dashboard

panel.title: Percent of suppressed notables - past 30 days

search.query: index=notable | eventstats count as total | search eventtype=notable_suppression-* OR suppression=* | stats count as "suppression" by total | eval percentage=(suppression*100)/total | table percentage

panel.title: Mean time to triage for High or Critical incidents - last 7 days

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` earliest(_time) as _time from datamodel=Incident_Management.Notable_Events_Meta by source,Notable_Events_Meta.rule_id | `drop_dm_object_name("Notable_Events_Meta")` | `get_correlations` | join rule_id [| from inputlookup:incident_review_lookup | search urgency IN (high critical) | eval _time=time | stats earliest(_time) as review_time by rule_id] | eval ttt=review_time-_time | stats count,avg(ttt) as avg_ttt,max(ttt) as max_ttt by rule_name | sort - avg_ttt | `uptime2string(avg_ttt, avg_ttt)` | `uptime2string(max_ttt, max_ttt)` | rename *_ttt* as *(time_to_triage)*, rule_name as "Rule Name", count as "Count", avg(time_to_triage) as "Avg time to triage", max(time_to_triage) as "Max time to triage" | fields - *_dec
| rest /services/storage/investigation/investigation splunk_server=local | stats count

panel.title: Number of investigations with more than one collaborator

search.query: | `investigations` | fields collaborators id | rename collaborators as _raw | spath | rename {}.name as collaborators | mvexpand collaborators | stats dc(collaborators) by id | where 'dc(collaborators)' > 1 | stats count

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities.Vulnerabilities where earliest=-30d@d latest=+0s `cim_filter_vuln_severity("Vulnerabilities")` by Vulnerabilities.signature,Vulnerabilities.dest | stats count

panel.title: Enabled correlation searches with MITRE ATT&CK annotations

search.query: | rest /services/saved/searches splunk_server=local | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") and match('is_scheduled',"1") and match('disabled',"0") | eventstats count as total | search action.correlationsearch.annotations="*mitre*" | stats count as "mitre" by total | eval percentage=(mitre*100)/total | table percentage

panel.title: Correlation searches with other framework annotations

search.query: | rest /services/saved/searches splunk_server=local | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") and match('is_scheduled',"1") and match('disabled',"0") | eventstats count as total | search action.correlationsearch.annotations IN ("*cis*" "*nist*" "kill_chain*") | stats count as "frameworks" by total | eval percentage=(frameworks*100)/total | table percentage

| rest /services/saved/searches splunk_server=local | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | eventstats count as total | search action.risk.param._risk="*score*" | stats count as "riskrules" by total | eval percentage=(riskrules*100)/total | table percentage

index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.annotations_usage" | table data.searches_with_mitre_attack | rename data.searches_with_mitre_attack as "MITRE ATT&CK"

index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.annotations_usage" | table data.searches_with_cis20 | rename data.searches_with_cis20 as CIS20

index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.annotations_usage" | table data.searches_with_kill_chain_phases | rename data.searches_with_kill_chain_phases as "Kill Chain"

index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_telemetry app=SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite component="app.SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite.annotations_usage" | table data.searches_with_nist | rename data.searches_with_nist as NIST

| inputlookup append=T service_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("service_intel")` | eval file_name=mvappend(service_file_name,service_dll_file_name), file_path=mvappend(service_file_path, service_dll_file_path), file_hash=mvappend(service_file_hash, service_dll_file_hash) | inputlookup append=T process_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("process_intel")` | eval ip=mvappend(src, dest), domain=mvappend(src, dest) | inputlookup append=T file_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("file_intel")` | inputlookup append=T certificate_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("certificate_intel")` | fillnull value="" certificate_serial | mvexpand certificate_serial | `get_certificate_serial` | eventstats values(certificate_serial) as certificate_serial,values(certificate_serial_clean) as certificate_serial_clean,values(certificate_serial_dec) as certificate_serial_dec by _key | dedup _key,threat_collection | inputlookup append=T email_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("email_intel")` | inputlookup append=T http_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("http_intel")` | inputlookup append=T ip_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("ip_intel")` | inputlookup append=T registry_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | `set_threat_collection_name("registry_intel")` | inputlookup append=T user_intel max=`threat_artifacts_max` where * | fillnull value=0 updated,disabled | `set_threat_collection_name("user_intel")` | eval file_hash=coalesce(certificate_file_hash,file_hash), src_user=coalesce(certificate_issuer_email,src_user), actual_src_user=coalesce(certificate_subject_email,actual_src_user), ip=coalesce(embedded_ip,ip), domain=coalesce(embedded_domain,domain), file_name=coalesce(process_file_name,file_name), file_path=coalesce(process_file_path,file_path) | stats dc(file_hash) as file_hash_count, dc(file_name) as file_name_count, dc(certificate_serial) as certificate_serial_count, dc(certificate_issuer_common_name) as certificate_issuer_common_name_count, dc(src_user) as src_user_count, dc(certificate_issuer_organization) as certificate_issuer_organization_count, dc(certificate_issuer_unit) as certificate_issuer_unit_count, dc(certificate_subject_common_name) as certificate_subject_common_name_count, dc(actual_src_user) as actual_src_user_count, dc(certificate_subject_organization) as certificate_subject_organization_count, dc(certificate_subject_unit) as certificate_subject_unit_count, dc(ip) as ip_count, dc(domain) as domain_count, dc(subject) as subject_count, dc(http_user_agent) as http_user_agent_count, dc(http_referrer) as http_referrer_count, dc(url) as url_count, dc(header) as header_count, dc(process) as process_count, dc(process_handle_name) as process_handle_name_count, dc(registry_path) as registry_path_count, dc(registry_value_name) as registry_value_name_count, dc(registry_value_text) as registry_value_text_count, dc(service) as service_count, dc(user) as user_count by threat_key | `get_threat_attribution(threat_key)` | search | addtotals fieldname=count *_count | fields source_id, source_path, source_type, threat_group, threat_category, malware_alias, count | sort + threat_group, threat_category, - count
